author: jeffghome2020
title: University/College Outreach
description: We need to reach out to university and college students and graduates to raise awareness of Cardano and the opportunities that exist.
solution: We intend to incubate interest in the blockchain by educating them with daily zooms and assisting in proposal development with the targets.
experience: Founder of Cardano Outreach, fund4/6 winner, we have reached 3320 students on twitch and zoom! A former manager and unversity grad.
